                 EV3UltrasonicSensor leftUsSensor,

        Constructor for the Navigation tool
        Parameters:
        odo - The odometer of the Robot
        leftUsSensor - The left US sensor of the Robot
        middleUsSensor - The middle US sensor of the robot

      • reverseToDispenser

        public void reverseToDispenser()
        Reverses the Robot 13cm. (Called to reverse to the ball dispenser)
        Parameters:
        none -

      • isObstacle

        public boolean isObstacle(EV3UltrasonicSensor usSensor,
                          int distanceWall)
        Checks whether a US Sensor sees an obstacle
        Parameters:
        usSensor - The sensor to be checked
        distanceWall - The minimum distance at which an object would be detected
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the sensor sees an object

      • setSpeeds

        public void setSpeeds(int lSpd,
                      int rSpd)
        Sets the speeds of the driving motors
        Parameters:
        lSpd - The speed to set the left motor
        rSpd - The speed to set the right motor

        public void travelToMinAngle(double x,
                             double y)
        Method which allows the robot to travel to an (x,y) position through the minimum angle
        Parameters:
        x - The requested x coordinate (in cm)
        y - The requested y coordinate (in cm)

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
                     double y)
        Method which allows the robot to travel to an (x,y) position by first travelling in x and then in y
        Parameters:
        x - The requested x coordinate (in cm)
        y - The requested y coordinate (in cm)

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double angle,
                   boolean stop)
        Method which turns the Robot to face a certain heading
        Parameters:
        angle - The requested angle (in degrees)
        stop - Boolean variable determining whether or not to stop the motors after turning

      • delay

        public void delay()
        Delay method for synchronization
        Parameters:
        none -

      • setHeadingCorrection

        public void setHeadingCorrection(double leftDistance,
                                 double rightDistance,
                                 boolean headingCorrect)
        Setter method called by Odometry Correction to inform the navigator that it must perform a heading correction
        Parameters:
        leftDistance - The distance sensed by the left color sensor (in cm)
        rightDistance - The distance sensed by the right color sensor (in cm)
        headingCorrect - Boolean variable representing the need for a heading correction

      • setToSlow

        public void setToSlow(boolean set)
        Method which sets the navigator to rotate at 50 degrees/sec
        Parameters:
        none -

      • headingCorrection

        public void headingCorrection(double leftDistance,
                              double rightDistance)
        Method which performs the heading correction
        Parameters:
        leftDistance - The distance sensed by the left color sensor (in cm)
        rightDistance - The distance sensed by the right color sensor (in cm)
